name: Rover Apps
overview: Rover is a Mobile Enterprise Application Platform for enterprises of all sizes. It provides the infrastructure for secure connectivity without the need for VPN or changes to the firewall for enterprise data during transport and on the mobile device. In addition to security, the platform provides for centralized access management and control, operations management, and rapid deployment of integration components and updates. The innovative “building block” architecture provides central configuration of optimized presentation and workflow to the native mobile clients. The platform enables integration to all existing enterprise applications with easy to develop tools and existing skillsets along with “out of the box” interfaces to common applications such as SharePoint.
